entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WordWrap doesn't wrap on a Label in a Grid if the ColumnDefinition is set to Auto. #21110
  • [Android] MAUI 8.0.3 -> 8.0.6 regression: custom handler with key listener no longer works #21109
  • dotnet workload install maui fails because Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui.Msi.x64 version 8.0.7 doesn't exist #21108
  • OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast() iOS/MacCatalyst mismatch makes it impossible to guard some features #21106
  • iOS: Flyout Menu Backdrop Area does not Readjust on Orientation Change #21105
  • Using synchronization primitives within a Draw callback causes a crash in the .NET runtime on Windows #21104
  • Border has an almost animated resizing effect when first loaded. (IOS) #21103
  • Switching from .net7.0-android to .net8.0-android causes 'missing java symbols errors' in runtime inside a .net8.0-android MAUI app #21102
  • MacCatalyst - Tabbing behaviour on a scrollable page of controls is inconsistent #21101
  • MAUI Shell Flyout unwanted click through behavior #21097
  • Maui-8.0.10-preview.10282 Fails AzureDevops looking for system runtime 9.00 #21096
  • [Maps] [Android] [Regression] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #21094
  • iOS scaling differently than Android #21093
  • Building MAUI projects with certain Unicode characters in the name result in failure to find Android and Windows manifests #21091

Closed

  • I need to create image and I need to put on top of it button and label any ideas? #21086
  • SearchBar crashes on iOS 17.4 #21085
  • [regression/8.0.3] BlazorWebView does not initialize properly on Android platform #19013
  • Expander is not working in ios inside collectionview #20004

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update Sdk and installer #21107
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [testing] Cleaning up TemplateTests iOS simulator issues #20817
    area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in `GestureRecognizers` #21089
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
